attributes.action: Apologise to the 106 families who lost soldiers in sangin province
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is on every news channel .today every news channel asked to speak to a member of parliament or the mod or the foreign office and not one had the courage to come forward and defend their decisions to send those men to their deaths.
attributes.background: All the service men who were killed in sangin died for no reason as the taliban again control the province ,after the government withdrew. So why did they give their lives for what?.
